amrap.title: AMRAP
amrap.description:
Repeat as many rounds as
possible for selected time

afap.name: AFAP
afap.title: FOR TIME
afap.description: Repeat rounds as fast as possible for selected time

emom.title: EMOM
emom.description: Complete one round and rest until the end of time

tabata.title: TABATA
tabata.description: Do the exercise alternating work and rest

work_rest.title: РАБОТА:ОТДЫХ
work_rest.description: Adjust the ratio between work time and rest time

confirm_exit_alert.title: Are you sure you want to get out?
confirm_exit_alert.content: Your progress will not be saved
